title: Shut Your Pie-Troll 2
description: Erin brings the case against her friend Ezra. Ezra hosts a "Bad Movie Night" at his house for their friends to watch movies, eat, and hang out. It's a popular event, but Erin says that Ezra could make the night way more fun if he just took a few of her suggestions. Who is right?
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
